editorialNotes.standard: Brew and serve espressos, lattes, and other caffeinated concoctions while building a bustling business in this charming coffee shop sim from the makers of Good Pizza, Great Pizza.
There’s a new king in town! Upgrade entire realms while battling an evil Dark King in the slick follow-up to Royal Match.

ios.subtitle: Grow to Eat! Snake Battle Game

editorialNotes.standard: We wouldn’t be surprised if Subway Surfers kept its spot near the top of the charts for decades to come. Its heart is the key to its stamina, revealed in loving details lavished on cities from Chicago to Shenzhen in its World Tours or in the lovable ruffians awarded in its frequent events. It’s a cinch to pick up, but we’re still finding new ways to master it years and miles later.

ios.subtitle: From Farming Town to Big City

editorialNotes.tagline: No data? No problem! Whether you’re hopping onto a plane or heading off the grid, disconnect with this great game.

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone’s suspicious in Among Us!, a fascinating multiplayer game set aboard a damaged spaceship. Whether you’re a Crewmate making quick repairs or an Impostor taking out key systems (and unsuspecting players), each match is a riveting mystery. And a hilarious one, especially when smart accusations or sly misdirection sway who gets voted off the ship. It’s a test of wits anyone can enjoy.
editorialNotes.short: Customize your look with Halloween-themed hats.

editorialNotes.standard: Clobber pesky rebels while rallying villagers and recruiting heroes in this idle strategic defense game.
Custom decks, quick matches, and new twists make this smartly designed mobile spin on the beloved card collector a great fit for both newcomers and veterans.
We love chilling with friends in this classic card game’s standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

ios.subtitle: Fun with the talking pet cat!

editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.
